sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1872年 京都東山の山麓、粟田口青連院内に仮療病院を開設
sen.e: 1872: A temporary hospital was established within the grounds of the Shoren-in Temple, which was located in Awataguchi, at the foot of Kyoto Higashiyama.
1872: A temporary hospital was established on the grounds of Shoren-in Temple, which was located in Awataguchi at the foot of Kyoto Higashiyama.
1872: A temporary hospital was established on the grounds of Shoren-in Temple, which was located in Awataguchi at the foot of Kyoto Higashiyama.

sen.j: 1880年 現在地の上京区河原町通広小路上る梶井町に療病院を移転
sen.e: 1880: The hospital was relocated to Kajiicho, Kawaramachi-dori Street Hirokoji agaru, Kamigyo-ku.
1880: The hospital was relocated to Kajiicho, Kawaramachi-dori Street Hirokoji agaru, Kamigyo-ku.
1880: The hospital was relocated to Kajiicho, Kawaramachi-dori Street Hirokoji agaru, Kamigyo-ku.

sen.j: 1903年 専門医学令による京都府立医学専門学校となる
sen.e: 1903: The hospital was reorganized as Kyoto Prefectural Medical School under the medical school ordinance.
1903: The hospital was reorganized as Kyoto Prefectural Medical School under the Medical School Ordinance.
1903: The hospital was reorganized as Kyoto Prefectural Medical School under the Medical School Ordinance.

sen.j: 1921年 大学令による京都府立医科大学を設置
sen.e: 1921: Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine was founded under the university ordinance.
1921: The Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine was founded under the University Ordinance.
1921: The Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine was founded under the University Ordinance.

sen.j: 1952年 学校教育法による新制京都府立医科大学となる
sen.e: 1952: Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine was approved under a new school education system.
sen.cmt: 原文には「新制京都府立医科大学」とありますが、新しい法律のもとに学校を改変しただけなので、名称自体は変わりなかったようです。そのため訳文中には以前のままの名称を使用し、「新制」の部分は「学校教育法」（定訳無し）の訳語に反映させました。
sen.e: 1952: Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine was approved under a new school education system.
1952: Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine was approved under the new educational system that was created in accordance with the School Education Law.
sen.cmt: 学校教育法の訳を修正

sen.j: 2002年 医療技術短期大学部を医学部看護学科に改組
sen.e: 2002: College of Medical Technology was reorganized as School of Nursing.
2002: The College of Medical Technology was reorganized as the School of Nursing.
2002: The College of Medical Technology was reorganized as the School of Nursing.

sen.j: 2008年 設置者を京都府立大学と共に京都府公立大学法人に移す
sen.e: 2008: The management of the university was replaced to the Kyoto Prefectural Public University Corporation along with Kyoto Prefectural University.
sen.cmt: http://www2.kpu.ac.jp/English/history.html「設置者」が移ったとありますが、学校の経営者が変わったという意味に捉えて訳しました。
sen.e: 2008: The management of the University was transferred to the Kyoto Prefectural Public University Corporation along with Kyoto Prefectural University.
2008: The management of the University was transferred to the Kyoto Prefectural Public University Corporation along with Kyoto Prefectural University.

sen.j: 京都市上京区河原町通広小路上る梶井町465

sen.cmt: Hirokoji agaru should come before "Kawaramachi-dori". I have also added "Street" and "Ward" for consistency.
